Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2017 01:16PM iowagirl77 wrote: The Dr. told me to take work off the day after! I thought that was kindof odd since is just a biopsy and nothing surgical. So I scheduled work off but If I feel ok Wednesday morning I am definitely coming in. I keep looking at other peoples ultrasound "findings" and comparing them to mine lol!
Posts.Title: Ultra sound results iowagirl77 solitude

Posts.Content: iowagirl77 wrote: Going in for the biopsy Tuesday! These are what the "findings" were. Anyone have any idea if they look for on the C side or b9? Any similar ultrasound results? Thanks At the 4:00 position of the left breast, approximately 3 cm from the nipple, an irregular hypoechoic solid-appearing lesion is again seen measuring 8 x 5 x 9 mm. Mild internal vascularity is noted as well as posterior acoustic shadowing. Ultrasound-guided biopsy is recommended. ASSESSMENT: BIRADS 4 - Suspicious - Biopsy should be considered.
